Performance updates, bug fixes and new features bring you the very best Viber experience. In particular, now you can:
- Mark messages as unread
- Send new and enlarged emoticons
- Save content in a new Favorites Chat Extension

•Get sticker suggestions when you tap on any emoticon
•Create colorful messages with Shouts Chat Extension
•Performance updates, bug fixes and new features bring you the very best Viber experience

Always get the best experience on Viber by keeping your app up to date. This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes to keep Viber running smoothly. When you update your app look out for what’s new with notifications across the app.

-Launch the Viber app at high-speed with our upgraded architecture
- Send messages 2x faster than ever, with the new chat screen experience, including bigger chat bubbles and larger photo thumbnails
- View when messages are delivered with new message status icons:
v = message sent
vv = message delivered
Purple vv = message seen
- Make crystal-clear calls with Viber’s new audio and video technology
- Control how much storage your Viber chats take up on your phone by setting how long photos, GIFs and videos are stored on your phone
This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes to create a smooth Viber experience. Keep your Viber app up to date to implement these updates, and look out for new features across the app.

- Control how much storage your Viber chats take up on your phone by setting how long photos, GIFs and videos are stored on your phone

Add a friend to up to 10 of your group chats with just one tap. Try it now: Open any 1on1 chat > Tap chat header to open Chat Info > Add to groups

You asked for it - chat in BLACK with the new dark theme on Viber. Try it now: More> Settings > Appearance
See the group chats you have in common with others on Viber. Tap any 1on1 chat info screen and choose “Groups in Common”
Never miss out on the perfect sticker! Check out the newest sticker packs in the Viber sticker market
Forward multiple messages to other chats. Send up to 25 messages to up to 10 chats at one time.
This update has made chatting on Viber faster, safer, and more fun. Keep your app up to date for the best of Viber!

Spring is always a good time for cleaning and refreshing! So that’s what we’ve done. We’ve cleared up some bugs and made improvements to keep chatting on Viber as sparkling as ever.

New in this version: Swipe right on a message to reply to it. Easy.

Introducing the new Viber 10 - Simpler, Faster & Safer!

Make a free group voice call with up to 5 participants.
Tap the phone icon from inside a group chat or add participants to an existing Viber call

Dark Mode has arrived! Take a walk on the dark side with a new Viber theme

Save money on calls to landlines and non-Viber mobiles with a monthly Viber Out unlimited plan
There's a community for everyone on Viber! Discover communities on topics you are passionate about and join the chat now.

Introducing the new Viber 10 - Simpler, Faster & Safer!

- Brand new design with a sleeker look

- Get all personal chats, groups, Communities and favorite public content in one main chat list

- Find recent calls and address book contacts in the new Calls screen

- More privacy: Chat with new people from your Communities and keep your phone number hidden

Create a poll in any group chat or Community, and watch how members vote live in the chat.

Send longer, better audio messages in any Viber chat:
Record up to 15 minutes
Record hands-free
Rewind or fast forward when listening to messages

New in Viber Communities!
Send private messages to other Community members while keeping phone numbers hidden from each other.

Always get the best experience on Viber by keeping your app up to date. This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes to keep Viber running smoothly. When you update your app look out for what’s new with notifications across the app.

Edit messages that you have already sent, by long tapping on any message.

Introducing Viber Communities!
A brand-new group chat experience - with unlimited members, more admin controls and new ways to grow the conversation.
Create your own Community to share your interests with people on Viber.

Translate messages in-chat - Long tap on a message to send it for translation into the language of your choice.

Group Calls are bigger than ever with up to *** 20 *** people at once, so it's easier and safer for you to connect with others.

Create your own GIF! In any chat, record a short video with our new camera or choose a video from your gallery - and turn it into a legendary looping GIF in boomerang, fast play or reverse modes
Create your own GIF! In any chat, record a short video with our new camera or choose a video from your gallery - and turn it into a legendary looping GIF in boomerang, fast play or reverse modes

Make messages disappear for extra privacy - turn on Disappearing Messages and you’re all set! 

Make a Group Video Call for up to 20 people on Viber. Start now from a group chat or add people to an ongoing video call. Feel closer than ever, even when you #StayAtHome.

Make messages disappear for extra privacy - turn on Disappearing Messages and you’re all set! 

Forwarded messages from other chats into “My Notes” will show from which chat you forwarded them, so you’ll always remember the context.

Create amazing stickers from your photos!
Shape your sticker and make it just how you want it!
Decorate it with doodles, text and more

Hide notes you've completed and marked as done on "My Notes." Oh, the satisfaction!
Start a call in any group chat - no matter its size - by tapping the top icon in the group chat and selecting up to 20 participants you want on the call. No more hassles.
Start a call in any group chat - no matter its size - by tapping the top icon in the group chat and selecting up to 20 participants you want on the call. No more hassles.
Control who can add you to groups⁠—everyone or saved contacts only. Go to More > Settings > Privacy

Express how you feel with Message Reactions in Communities and group chats. Long-tap the heart icon next to the message and to show how you feel.
Quiz anyone on anything in group chats or Communities using Quiz mode. Whether it’s for school or fun, tap the Polls icon and start quizzing!

Important events will never get lost again in 1-on-1 chats! Pin any message that you want to remember and see easily:
Long tap any message > Pin.

Important events will never get lost again in 1-on-1 chats! Pin any message that you want to remember and see easily:
Long tap any message > Pin.

Start a call in any group chat - no matter its size - by tapping the top icon in the group chat and selecting up to 19 participants you want on the call. No more hassles.

Swipe left on any of your messages to select multiple messages you want to delete or forward.

Swipe left on any of your messages to select multiple messages you want to delete or forward.

Set reminders on Viber with My Notes. No more switching between apps, all your messages and reminders are in one place!
Long-tap any message on My Notes > Tap Set Reminder.

As a Community admin, get to know your audience better and faster - see views, clicks and shares right after posting and grow a massive Community: Long-tap any message > Info.

Say hi to group video calls with 30 participants. Big family? Problem solved!

See up to 6 people on your call screen at once. Got more people on your call? No problem, swipe left to see all of them, 6 at a time.
